statements.select: select count(1) from BM_MAIN_ASSEMBLY where I_INTID = #value#
statements.insert:
select seq_BM_MAIN_ASSEMBLY_id.nextval as I_INTID from dual
INSERT INTO BM_MAIN_ASSEMBLY ( I_INTID ,C_ASSEMBLYNAME ,C_ASSEMBLYSHORTNAME ,I_CREATEEMPID ,I_MANAGEEMPID ,I_ISFORBID ,D_CREATETIME ,I_CREATEUSER ,D_UPDATETIME ,I_UPDATEUSER) values (#IntId#,#AssemblyName#,#AssemblyShortName#,#CreateEMPId.IntId#,#ManageEMPId.IntId#,#IsForbid.EntityValue#,sysdate,#CreateUser.IntId#,sysdate,#UpdateUser.IntId#)
statements.update: update BM_MAIN_ASSEMBLY set C_ASSEMBLYNAME = #AssemblyName# ,C_ASSEMBLYSHORTNAME = #AssemblyShortName# ,I_CREATEEMPID = #CreateEMPId.IntId# ,I_MANAGEEMPID = #ManageEMPId.IntId# ,I_ISFORBID = #IsForbid.EntityValue# ,D_UPDATETIME=sysdate ,I_UPDATEUSER = #UpdateUser.IntId# where I_INTID = #IntId#
update BM_MAIN_ASSEMBLY set I_ISFORBID = #IsForbid.EntityValue# where I_INTID = #IntId#
statements.select: SELECT a.I_INTID ,a.C_ASSEMBLYNAME ,a.C_ASSEMBLYSHORTNAME ,a.I_CREATEEMPID ,b.C_USERNICKNAME I_CREATEEMPNAME ,a.I_MANAGEEMPID ,c.C_USERNICKNAME I_MANAGEEMPNAME ,a.I_ISFORBID ,a.D_CREATETIME ,a.I_CREATEUSER ,d.C_USERNICKNAME I_CREATEUSERNAME ,a.D_UPDATETIME ,a.I_UPDATEUSER ,e.C_USERNICKNAME I_UPDATEUSERNAME from BM_MAIN_ASSEMBLY a left join BM_USER b on a.I_CREATEEMPID = b.I_INTID left join BM_USER c on a.I_MANAGEEMPID = c.I_INTID left join BM_USER d on a.I_CREATEUSER = d.I_INTID left join BM_USER e on a.I_UPDATEUSER = e.I_INTID

SELECT a.I_INTID ,a.C_ASSEMBLYNAME ,a.C_ASSEMBLYSHORTNAME ,a.I_CREATEEMPID ,b.C_USERNICKNAME I_CREATEEMPNAME ,a.I_MANAGEEMPID ,c.C_USERNICKNAME I_MANAGEEMPNAME ,a.I_ISFORBID ,a.D_CREATETIME ,a.I_CREATEUSER ,d.C_USERNICKNAME I_CREATEUSERNAME ,a.D_UPDATETIME ,a.I_UPDATEUSER ,e.C_USERNICKNAME I_UPDATEUSERNAME from BM_MAIN_ASSEMBLY a left join BM_USER b on a.I_CREATEEMPID = b.I_INTID left join BM_USER c on a.I_MANAGEEMPID = c.I_INTID left join BM_USER d on a.I_CREATEUSER = d.I_INTID left join BM_USER e on a.I_UPDATEUSER = e.I_INTID where a.I_ISFORBID = 0 and a.I_INTID=#IntId#

SELECT a.I_INTID ,a.C_ASSEMBLYNAME ,a.C_ASSEMBLYSHORTNAME ,a.I_CREATEEMPID ,b.C_USERNICKNAME I_CREATEEMPNAME ,a.I_MANAGEEMPID ,c.C_USERNICKNAME I_MANAGEEMPNAME ,a.I_ISFORBID ,a.D_CREATETIME ,a.I_CREATEUSER ,d.C_USERNICKNAME I_CREATEUSERNAME ,a.D_UPDATETIME ,a.I_UPDATEUSER ,e.C_USERNICKNAME I_UPDATEUSERNAME from BM_MAIN_ASSEMBLY a left join BM_USER b on a.I_CREATEEMPID = b.I_INTID left join BM_USER c on a.I_MANAGEEMPID = c.I_INTID left join BM_USER d on a.I_CREATEUSER = d.I_INTID left join BM_USER e on a.I_UPDATEUSER = e.I_INTID where a.I_INTID = #value#

SELECT a.I_INTID ,a.C_ASSEMBLYNAME ,a.C_ASSEMBLYSHORTNAME ,a.I_CREATEEMPID ,b.C_USERNICKNAME I_CREATEEMPNAME ,a.I_MANAGEEMPID ,c.C_USERNICKNAME I_MANAGEEMPNAME ,a.I_ISFORBID ,a.D_CREATETIME ,a.I_CREATEUSER ,d.C_USERNICKNAME I_CREATEUSERNAME ,a.D_UPDATETIME ,a.I_UPDATEUSER ,e.C_USERNICKNAME I_UPDATEUSERNAME from BM_MAIN_ASSEMBLY a left join BM_USER b on a.I_CREATEEMPID = b.I_INTID left join BM_USER c on a.I_MANAGEEMPID = c.I_INTID left join BM_USER d on a.I_CREATEUSER = d.I_INTID left join BM_USER e on a.I_UPDATEUSER = e.I_INTID where a.C_ASSEMBLYNAME = #value#
